nodes.bodyText: @cristianonicolai A solution i could think of now is adding a displayName at the bottom of KogitoSpinner.tsx like this "KogitoSpinner.displayName = 'KogitoSpinner'". Enzyme understands this displayName and replaces Component with KogitoSpinner.

nodes.bodyText: is this interface needed to be exported?
I was trying to follow the same as PatternFly does with its components but it doesnt seem to be necessary in our context.
